Lenaâ€™s Artistic Beauty College can help you become a licensed cosmetologist. Our full service beauty school offers a complete cosmetology program that teaches all the required skills you need in order to apply for a beauty license. We have been helping people make their cosmetology dreams come true for over 50 years! Classroom education and hands-on salon hours are offered.

All types of hair care are taught and students learn all the basic techniques as well as popular and trendy styles. Aesthetics and nail care are also covered, including manicures and pedicures. In order to receive your license, completion of our 1,500-hour course is required.


Find Out For More Information On Our Classes



The only place to go is ahead when you take our advanced training courses. You develop the advanced understanding necessary to teach others the art of cosmetology. Take control of your future and acquire the techniques that put you at the forefront of your profession.
